Body: See screenshot:(Click image to enlarge)That  ad seems to be the the one causing any application to die abruptly for absolutely nothing.I saw that ad when I was using Skype. I also saw it when I was playing Clash of Clans and other games.How do I get rid of it? What applications have that ad?EDIT:I restored factory settings and an app tried to ask permission to send ads. I click cancel. After a while that app tried to ask permission again. I have no idea what ad it is.I did a factory reset. Now the ad is gone. However it is replaced by annoying permission request.The problem with the permission is it's not clear which app ask for that permission.Also, I do not think this question is a duplicate because I got the problem even after factory reset and I see that this app is supported by airpush notification. Obviously, as a user, I just want to delete the app. What app?Furthermore, I can't scan my Android. Every scanner, malware anti virus, airpush detector fails and crashes.I think some apps are embedded in my ROM. That's why the price is a bit cheaper.
Title: Find applications causing a particular advertisement and get rid of latter?

history.Text: Let me show you some screenshot[![enter image description here][1]][1]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/EXcwy.jpgAlso that stupid ads seem to be the one causing any application to die abruptly for absolutely nothing.How do I get rid of it? What applications have that ads?I saw that ads when I am using skype. I also saw it when I am playing clash of clans and other games.
My android phones often have this annoying ads that shows up on ANY apps?

history.Text: See screenshot:(Click image to enlarge)[][1]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/EXcwy.jpgThat  ad seems to be the the one causing any application to die abruptly for absolutely nothing.I saw that ad when I was using Skype. I also saw it when I was playing Clash of Clans and other games.How do I get rid of it? What applications have that ad?I think you're right. I restore factory setting and "an app" tried to ask permission to send ads. I click cancel. After a while that app tried to ask permission again. I have no idea what ads it is.

See screenshot:(Click image to enlarge)[][1]That  ad seems to be the the one causing any application to die abruptly for absolutely nothing.I saw that ad when I was using Skype. I also saw it when I was playing Clash of Clans and other games.How do I get rid of it? What applications have that ad?I think you're right. I restore factory setting and "an app" tried to ask permission to send ads. I click cancel. After a while that app tried to ask permission again. I have no idea what ads it is.I do a factory reset. Now the ads is GONE. However it is replaced by annoying permission request.I think some apps is embeded in my ROM. That's why the price is a bit cheaper.The problem with the permission is it's not clear which app ask for that stupid permission[![enter image description here][2]][2]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/EXcwy.jpg  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/CerSI.jpg

I also saw it when I was playing Clash of Clans and other games.How do I get rid of it? What applications have that ad?I think you're right. I restore factory setting and "an app" tried to ask permission to send ads. I click cancel. After a while that app tried to ask permission again. I have no idea what ads it is.I do a factory reset. Now the ads is GONE. However it is replaced by annoying permission request.I think some apps is embeded in my ROM. That's why the price is a bit cheaper.The problem with the permission is it's not clear which app ask for that stupid permission[![enter image description here][2]][2]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/EXcwy.jpg  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/CerSI.jpgI do not think it is duplicate. That's because I got the problem even after factory reset and I see that this app is supported by airpush notification. Obviously, as a user, I just want to delete the app. What app?Also I can't scan my android. Every scanner, malware anti virus, airpush detector fail and crash.I am returning the phone.
